summary: A new and improved version of the original mod: rk Followers. This adds 7 standalone followers including a healer, Trill, and the Japanese speaking warrior, Kaede.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/5/4225/34508588140_51cdcd083a_c.jpg[/img]



[img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/5/4249/34854498106_ff25c5a133_o.png[/img]


[size=3]SKSE
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863?]SkyUI[/url][/size]


If you're going to hire Bolero, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74568/?]Relationship Dialogue Overhaul - RDO[/url] is almost required
because her voice type(female sultry) is having some problems officially and that mod fixes it.




[img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/5/4269/34507848510_aafe530dec_o.png[/img]

My English sucks but my Japanese rocks


All the work about their appearance
by rxkx22

All the other work
by cloudedtruth


All the characters appearance is standalone. They are all marriageable and essential.
Installing this mod with a mod manger is hightly recommended because this mod is created as Fomod installer and you can choose some options.
This mod contains an MCM menu which provide a few options that you can utilize (see "MCM function" below).
I chose their voice types based on the English voice so feel free to change it in TES5Edit or CK if they sound mismatched in your language voice.
[color=#ff0000]NOTE! ----[/color] Changing Kaede's voice in xEdit or CK will [color=#ff0000]NOT[/color] work, as her voice type will be changed back to the voice selected in the MCM upon loading.
There is a possibility that their faces a little different from screenshots because I tweaked some of them after taking.





[img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/5/4197/34762964461_ba43cca1eb_o.png[/img]


[size=3]= Installation =[/size]

Install this mod with a mod manager.
[color=#ffd966]Please uninstall the old rk folllowers mod beforehand[/color] if you still have it



[size=3]= Uninstallation =
[/size]
[1]
Retrieve all of their items that you don't want to possibly lose and dismiss them, if they're currently following you

[2]
Make sure you and them are not in the same cell (either wait, sleep, change cells yourself, or wait for her to walk out of the current cell)

[3]
Make a new save and quit skyrim

[4]
Uninstall the mod and load the new save you made at [3]



[img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/5/4247/34507848470_96a280ca28_o.png[/img]


[color=#f6b26b][size=3]Kaede(楓)[/size][/color]

Race : Japanese(actually Nord though)
Voice : Japanese YoungEager or FemaleYoungEager(MCM option)
Location : Four Shields Tavern(Dragon Bridge)
Weight : 60
Height : 0.97(Default Nord height x 0.97)
Combat style : Two-handed, Heavy armor. Archery etc..


[color=#cc0000][size=3]Aria[/size][/color]

Race : Nord
Voice : EvenToned like Lydia
Location : The Bannered Mare(Whiterun)
Weight : 80
Height : 1.00
Combat style : Almost the same as Lydia but a little stronger becaus of some perks.


[color=#c27ba0][size=3]Varnela[/size][/color]

Race : Mixed race by Dark elf and Nord
Voice : Commander like Aela
Location : Windpeak inn (Dawnstar)
Weight 100
Height : 1.03(Default Nord height x 1.03)
Combat style : Destruction, one-handed, Both heavy and light armor etc..


[color=#ffd966][size=3]Trill[/size][/color]

Race : High Elf
Voice : YoungEager like Ysolda
Location : The Winking Skeever(Solitude)
Weight : 60
Height : 0.9(Default Hight elf height x 0.9)
Combat style : Healer, Destruction, light armor, etc..


[color=#6aa84f][size=3]Bolero[/size][/color]

Race : Imperial
Voice : FemaleSultry like Saadia
Location : Haelga's Bunkhouse(Riften)
Weight : 70
Height : 1.011(Default Imperial height x 1.011)
Combat style : One-handed(Dual wielding), light armor, sneak, Archery, etc...


[color=#6d9eeb][size=3]Saraband[/size][/color]

Race : Dark Elf
Voice : Dark Elf
Location : New Gnisis Cornerclub(Windhelm)
Weight 70
Height 1.00
Combat style : Destruction, one-handed, light armor, sneak etc..


[color=#cc4125][size=3]Salsa[/size][/color]

Race : Redguard
Voice : FemaleCondescending like Ingjard
Location : Dead Man's Drink(Falkreath)
Weight : 80
Height : 1.01(Default Redguard height x 1.01)
Combat style : Can handle anything(including dual wielding) except for magic



Their height would be different from what I intended if you used any mod that changes races height
so feel free to change it with console command(setscale XX) if strange in your game.

Their height is like this by default
Shorter ===  Trill < Kaede < Saraband < Salsa < Bolero < Aria < Varnela === Taller

Don't ask me why the highelf girl is the shortest :-y


FYI
Their height refers the same height as esp's(default) when you type "setscale 1.0".
It means that for example, Trill's height will be (Default High Elf height) x 0.9 even if you type setscale 1.0 because her height is set as 0.9 in esp.
So, by using setscale 1.0 you can fix the well-known height issue that NPC gets short or tall after using something like Arcane enchanter、work bench etc...



[img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/5/4202/34854498936_3ac404c406_o.png[/img]


Voice changer for Kaede

Control healing options for Trill

Summoning each follower, or all at once, to the player

Add quest markers on each follower, or all at once, to track their current location





[img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/5/4251/34854498586_7a0d96f2b0_o.png[/img]


Follower overhaul mod such as AFT

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35303/?]Female Facial Animation[/url] by nao4288 <= [color=#cc0000]Highly Recommended
[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74568/?]Relationship Dialogue Overhaul - RDO[/url] by cloudedtruth

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30533/?]Face to face conversation[/url] by towawot

I basically recommend to use ENB but some of them have a bit overdone "subsurface scattering" setting
and unfortunately it makes characters faces that I created detailedly show dim(dull? don't know how to explain it in English)
so try tweaking or disabling that setting once in ENB GUI if you feel their faces look too smooth compared to my screenshots.




[img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/5/4219/34507848180_0975cb997f_o.png[/img]



Q : I lost them...
or
Q : I want to make Trill stop her heal.
A : Open the MCM and select the appropriate option. 

Q I want to know what Kaede says
A : Enable SUB (subtitles)

Q : Renewal? Where is the original, link?
A : I deleted it long ago but don't worry, this renewal is 100 times better. It's over 9000

Q : Want their face presets!?hcgiu,ghwgdhiwg???ｊｈさｇｋｇｃｋｈｒｇ
A : Use the RaceMenu function but ask me first if you're going to upload a mod with it.

Q : I wanna change their body type!
[spoiler]
[1]
Copy the following 2 body meshes which you want to use from the body mod.
If you want to use the same body as the player character, copy them from Data/meshes/actors/character/character assets/here

femalebody_0
femalebody_1

[2]
Overwrite her(their) meshes Data/meshes/actors/character/[Character named folder]/here by [1]'s files.

*Copy and overwrite the following files as well if the hands and feet have any seams on them.

femalefeet_0
femalefeet_1
femalehands_0
femalehands_1

[3]
Done.
[/spoiler]



[img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/5/4248/34731329472_48ea4f9d4b_o.png[/img]
